pageContext.claim: “If you read what Mollie Hemingway said, who's a real reporter, a great journalist, you'll see that that story was fake. They didn't use tear gas. They didn't use -- they moved them out.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is referring to a writer from the Federalist, a pro-Trump publication that does not disclose its funders. Despite what she wrote, U.S. authorities later confirmed that they did use tear gas (an umbrella term for chemical irritants) to disperse peaceful protesters outside the White House.
